conclusion: Between 0 s and 10 s the speed of the skydiver is increasing (the slope of the v-t curve is positive).

premise: Between 0 s and 10 s the speed of the skydiver is increasing (the slope of the v-t curve is positive).
conclusion: An increasing downward speed means the acceleration vector is directed downward, i.e., toward the Earth (in the same direction as gravity).
